overview:
Matt came up with the concept of GreenLight. He handles the feature creation and the recommendation algorithms, and will design and build the user interface. Matt is responsible for ensuring the features create a strong viral co-efficient whilst allowing GreenLight to generate the maximum revenue from its users.

 10 years of experience in IT & Software Development  Experienced senior manager and track history of growing and managing large teams  Bootstrapped to launch his own IT consultancy in 2009 (recently stepped away to focus on GreenLight)  Experienced in designing and building software  Experienced in MySQL & MSSQL database design
